member.name: T:AudioKor.Track
member.summary: Used to specify which Audio Track to affect.

member.name: M:AudioKorLib.Interfaces.IAudioKor.PlayMusic(System.String)
member.summary: Starts a track that plays music.
member.param: The music asset to be played.

member.name: M:AudioKorLib.Interfaces.IAudioKor.PlayMusic(System.String,AudioKor.Track)
member.summary: Starts a track that plays music.
member.param: The music asset to be played.
The track that will be used.

member.name: M:AudioKorLib.Interfaces.IAudioKor.PauseMusic
member.summary: Pauses music and ambience playing from all tracks.

member.name: M:AudioKorLib.Interfaces.IAudioKor.PauseMusic(AudioKor.Track)
member.summary: Pauses music and ambience playing from one track.
member.param: The track that will be paused.

member.name: M:AudioKorLib.Interfaces.IAudioKor.PlaySFX(System.String)
member.param: The sound effect name to be played.

member.name: M:AudioKorLib.Interfaces.IAudioKor.SetMasterVolume(System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the general volume of all audio components.
member.param: The general volume for all components.

member.name: M:AudioKorLib.Interfaces.IAudioKor.SetMusicVolume(System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the volume of all music tracks.
member.param: The volume for all music tracks.

member.name: M:AudioKorLib.Interfaces.IAudioKor.SetSFXVolume(System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the volume for all sound effects.
member.param: The volume for all sound effects.
